content.prompt: The role of new technology in economic change in the late 1800s was most similar to the role of technology in which of the following earlier situations?

choices.label: The fur trade developed in the 1600s, fostering new forms of interactions between peoples.
Trans-Atlantic commerce grew in the colonial era, taking advantage of navigational innovations.
Manufacturing spread in the early 1800s, allowing more efficient production.
Sharecropping emerged in the Reconstruction era, channeling farmers into new labor systems.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
